title: FIFO Buffer Management
name: LGF_FIFO
description: FIFO (First-In First-Out / Queue / ring buffer memory) This function stores incoming data and outputs the oldest unprocessed data.

input.name: dequeue
input.description: Dequeue item from the buffer and return it on `item`

input.name: reset
input.description: Initializing the buffer (reset the index and the counter)

input.name: clear
input.description: Clearing the buffer and initialize with the initial value `initialItem` (Reset index and counter).

input.name: initialItem
input.description: Value with which the ARRAY of the buffer is initialized (usually: `0` / default value)

output.name: error
output.description: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: Status of the FB, Error identification

output.name: subFunctionStatus
output.description: Status or return value of called FB's, FC's and system blocks

output.name: elementCount
output.description: Number of elements in the buffer

in/out.name: item
in/out.description: The entry that is either returned from the ring buffer or written into the buffer

in/out.name: buffer
in/out.description: The ARRAY that is used as the ring buffer.
